turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Road to Zion.
turn.1: What is the song Road to Zion about?
turn.2: Road to Zion "Road to Zion" was the 2nd US single to be taken from Damian Marley's "Welcome to Jamrock", while "The Master Has Come Back" was released in Europe.
turn.4: It contains a sample from "Russian Lullaby" by Ella Fitzgerald.
turn.5: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.6: The song also inspired Nas and Damian Marley to record an EP together, which later turned into the full-length album "Distant Relatives" released in 2010.
turn.7: Is there anything else of significance?
turn.8: The video was filmed in Kew Gardens and it features cameos from Chali 2na of Jurassic 5 (on the street), George Clinton and Game being locked up with Nas, and Damian handing out postcards with the Lion of Judah on them.
turn.10: After Nas analyzes the card, he manages to escape the prison he’s in and reunite with the young Marley back in a project hallway.
